name: Channel Surfing
description:
The local retirement home lost all of their TV remotes - you're their only hope now that they are all out of controls! 

Controls:

Hold the Left [<] or Right [>] Arrow key to change channels

Press [A] or [D] to flip pages in your Television Guide book

As with (almost) all Jam games Channel Surfing is incomplete, buggy, and unbalanced.  Built to be played in 1080p.
